title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
plot: A thief steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for mankind.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: Toy Story
plot: A cowboy doll feels threatened by a flashy spaceman action figure.
